main event: On 27th December 1954 in Long Beach, California, a civilian observed two long red objects for 5 minutes, moving westward.
interesting points: The observation involved both ground-radar and ground-visual sightings.
The objects were described as two long red objects with no further descriptive details
The report states that there was only one observer and no follow-up investigation material
Another report from 21st December 1954 in Long Beach, California, mentioned a sighting of a round blue light traveling at an estimated speed of 200 knots at a very high altitude.
The report concluded that there was very little information and suggested that the sighting was probably an A.C. (Aircraft)
sighted object: two long red objects and a round blue light
